description:
In this course, We provide a walkthrough for Udemy Teachers to build their courses using the latest softwares and trends in a way that suits each student's understanding level. In addition, we show that presenting a course under a brand adds more credibility to it. Last but not least, we guide teachers into promoting their course using the latest marketing strategies and techniques.

This course is meant for everybody that wish to startup his Online Teaching career The right way. Not only that, if you're seeking to strengthen your course content and boost your sales, this course is also for you!

In the first section of our course You'll enjoy a step-by-step curriculum that will walk you through building your course content using actual projects, to illustrate all the necessary concepts efficiently. Moreover, you'll learn how to design your course logo, banner and promo video using both Adobe Illustrator and Adobe After Effects. Branding really makes a difference when it comes to giving a good impression to your potential students. In the Second section, you'll learn how you can build your website using Wordpress. In addition, most of the lectures will guide you through customizing your website appearance, in a way that suits your course topics. No technical skills are required for this step. In the third section, you'll be able to host some of your course content as a preview in you website to give the impression of a sustainable brand to your audience. Last but not least, all the marketing strategies will be demonstrated in our last section of the course. You'll learn how to integrate the add-ons of your choice to Wordpress, in order for you to build emailing lists, host webinars, offer Pay-per-View Content and much more.

Join Us in this amazing journey to become one of Udemy's Elite Teachers! All it takes is going through our 30 lectures
title: Startup Your Online Teaching Empire
